title: Is E3 Still Relevant? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.30.20
description:
Today, Blessing is joined by ZombaeKillz to discuss E3's relevance, Riot's deal with Neom, and more. 
 
FOLLOW ZOMBAEKILLZ: https://twitter.com/zombaekillz https://twitch.tv/ZombaeKillz 

Time Stamps - 
 00:00:00 - Start
00:07:28 - Housekeeping

It’s Major Nelson week on Kinda Funny!
Today, join Greg and Major Nelson for We Have Cool Friends.
Friday, Major Nelson joins Greg for Kinda Funny Games Daily.
Saturday, Major Nelson joins Snowbike Mike and Alanah Pearce for the Kinda Funny Xcast.
That all is going down right here on Twitch, youtube.com/KindaFunny, Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames, and podcast services around the globe.
The Roper Report   -
00:08:23 - Big publisher showcases did not suffer from absence of E3
00:19:19 - A Halo developer responds to criticism about the game’s graphics
00:27:58 - People Can Fly (Bulletstorm, Outriders) is working on a new next gen game
00:31:18 - Riot ends sponsorship with controversial Saudi city Neom
00:37:53 - CD Projekt Red Says There's No Cyberpunk Beta Following Email Scam Attempts
00:44:20 - Out today
00:48:00 - Reader mail   -
00:49:32 - “With Smart Delivery and Backwards Compatibility a thing now, do we still expect more out of games beyond a boost of graphics/performance?” - BJ Bernardo
00:53:52 - “From Software has released new information on an update coming to Sekiro in October…” - Chance Carter
00:59:00 - Squad Up: Brandon in Atlanta - Xbox - Engine25
00:59:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Major Nelson
